title: GraphQL-to-REST API Connectors Is Apollo's ‘Biggest Thing’
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Apollo GraphQL Connectors offer a way to translate a REST API (with more APIs coming) into the GraphQL language.
cntitle: GraphQL-to-REST API 连接器是 Apollo 的“最伟大的成就”
cndescription: Apollo GraphQL 连接器提供了一种将 REST API（以及即将推出的更多 API）转换为 GraphQL 语言的方法。
